issues.description: The solution implementation makes two getter methods private (getLectureName() and getNumberOfInscribedStudents()) while the problem statement asks students to "Implement getters for each attribute" and the tests referenced in the problem (e.g. getLectureNameTest(), getNumberOfInscribedStudentsTest()) expect public getters. This visibility mismatch will cause confusion and test failures because callers (tests or user code) cannot access these getters when they are private.
